blog_posts.title: Welcome to My Portfolio
blog_posts.content:
# Welcome to My Portfolio

This is the first post on my new portfolio website. I'm excited to share my projects and thoughts with you.

## About Me

I'm a passionate developer who loves to create beautiful and functional websites and applications. My focus is on user experience and clean, maintainable code.

## What's Coming

Stay tuned for more posts about my projects, thoughts on technology, and tutorials on web development.

blog_posts.title: Why I Chose Directus for My CMS
blog_posts.content:
# Why I Chose Directus for My CMS

After evaluating several headless CMS options, I decided to go with Directus for my portfolio website. Here's why:

## Open Source and Self-Hosted

Directus is completely open-source and can be self-hosted, giving me full control over my data and infrastructure.

## Flexible Schema

The schema management in Directus is incredibly flexible, allowing me to create exactly the data structure I need for my content.

## Great Developer Experience

With its comprehensive API and excellent documentation, developing with Directus has been a pleasure.

## Powerful Admin Interface

The admin interface is intuitive and user-friendly, making content management a breeze.

blog_posts.content: This is a draft post that I'm still working on. It will be published once it's complete.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description:
My personal portfolio website built with Nuxt.js and Directus CMS. Features a blog, project showcase, and gallery.

## Technologies Used

- Nuxt.js
- Directus CMS
- Tailwind CSS
- PostgreSQL

## Features

- Responsive design
- Blog with Markdown support
- Project showcase
- Image gallery

projects.title: E-commerce Platform
projects.description:
A full-featured e-commerce platform built with React and Node.js.

## Technologies Used

- React
- Node.js
- Express
- MongoDB

## Features

- User authentication
- Product catalog
- Shopping cart
- Payment processing
- Order management

projects.title: Weather App
projects.description:
A simple weather application that displays current weather conditions and forecasts based on user location.

## Technologies Used

- JavaScript
- OpenWeather API
- HTML/CSS

## Features

- Current weather conditions
- 5-day forecast
- Location-based weather data
- Responsive design
